explains: v. 使安心，使消除疑虑

sentences.en: They tried to reassure her, but she still felt anxious.
sentences.cn: 他们设法让她放心，可她还是焦虑不安。

sentences.en: Banks are built to look solid to reassure their customers.
sentences.cn: 银行修建得看上去很坚固，以使顾客放心。

sentences.en: His father smiled weakly in a forlorn attempt to reassure him that everything was all right.
sentences.cn: 他父亲淡淡地一笑，枉然地试图要他放心，一切都安然无恙。
